SELECT d.SourceId,d.SourceName,d.Longt,d.Lat,da.DictName AS 'Rank' FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO d JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO c ON d.CompanyId=c.CompanyId JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT da ON d.Rank=da.DictId WHERE 1 = 1
AND c.companyName LIKE '%'+ #{companyName} + '%'
AND d.sourceName LIKE '%'+ #{sourceName} + '%'
AND d.rank = #{rank}

SELECT d.SourceId,d.UniqueCode,c.CompanyName AS 'CompanyId',d.SourceName,d.RValue,sd.DictName AS 'Rank', d.RecordNo,d.Validity,d1.DictName AS 'Status',d.Longt,d.Lat,d.OutPersonCount,d.DeathToll,d.RecordDate, (SELECT STUFF((SELECT ','+dic.DictName FROM TB_REL_DRESOURCE_ACCIDENTYPE t JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT dic ON t.TypeId = dic.DictId WHERE t.SourceId=#{sourceId} FOR XML PATH ('')),1,1,'')) AS AccidentType FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO d LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO c ON d.CompanyId=c.CompanyId LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON d.Rank=sd.DictId LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT d1 ON d.Status = d1.DictId WHERE d.sourceId = #{sourceId}
SELECT ci.* FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di JOIN TB_REL_DRESOURCE_CHEMICAL dc on dc.SourceId=di.SourceId JOIN TB_BASE_CHEMICAL_INFO ci ON ci.ChemId=dc.ChemId WHERE di.SourceId=#{sourceId}

SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(di.SourceId),0) AS num,d.DictId,d.DictName FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di RIGHT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT d ON di.Rank = d.DictId WHERE d.TypeId = '8ea8562f-e58b-461c-9485-a967bc5e29ca' GROUP BY d.DictId,d.DictName,d.DictOrder ORDER BY d.DictOrder

SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(di.SourceId),0) AS num,sd.DictName FROM TB_REL_DRESOURCE_ACCIDENTYPE da JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di ON da.SourceId=di.SourceId RIGHT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON da.TypeId=sd.DictId WHERE sd.TypeId = '61c44efb-ec19-4f92-9c47-507dee5b4bbe' GROUP BY sd.DictId,sd.DictName,sd.DictOrder ORDER BY sd.DictOrder

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sd2.DictId AS typeId,sd2.DictName AS typeName,sd2.dictOrder,'等级' AS stack, STUFF((SELECT ',' + CAST (COUNT (di.SourceId) AS VARCHAR) FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO ci ON sd.DictId = ci.DirectArea LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di ON ci.CompanyId=di.CompanyId AND di.Rank=sd2.DictId WHERE sd.TypeId = '8b4524ce-15cf-404a-8182-a7e8a8d68343' GROUP BY sd.DictId,sd.DictName,sd.DictOrder ORDER BY sd.DictOrder FOR xml path ('')),1,1,'') AS numList FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd2 WHERE sd2.TypeId = '8ea8562f-e58b-461c-9485-a967bc5e29ca') AS t ORDER BY dictOrder

SELECT sd2.DictId AS typeId,sd2.DictName AS typeName,sd2.dictOrder,'等级' AS stack, STUFF((SELECT ',' + CAST (COUNT (di.SourceId) AS VARCHAR) FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd LEFT JOIN TB_REL_COMPANY_INDUSTRY rci ON sd.DictId=rci.IndustryId LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di ON rci.CompanyId=di.CompanyId AND di.Rank=sd2.DictId WHERE sd.TypeId = '29485cb6-bf2e-4892-ab3a-083ffbb2e6f9' GROUP BY sd.DictId,sd.DictName,sd.DictOrder ORDER BY sd.DictOrder FOR xml path ('')),1,1,'') AS numList FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd2 WHERE sd2.TypeId = '8ea8562f-e58b-461c-9485-a967bc5e29ca' -- UNION -- SELECT sd2.DictId AS typeId,sd2.DictName AS typeName,sd2.dictOrder,'类型' AS stack, -- STUFF((SELECT ',' + CAST (COUNT(da.SourceId) AS VARCHAR) -- FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd -- LEFT JOIN TB_REL_COMPANY_INDUSTRY ci ON ci.IndustryId = sd.DictId -- LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di ON ci.CompanyId=di.CompanyId -- LEFT JOIN TB_REL_DRESOURCE_ACCIDENTYPE da ON (da.SourceId=di.SourceId AND da.TypeId=sd2.DictId) -- WHERE sd.TypeId = '29485cb6-bf2e-4892-ab3a-083ffbb2e6f9' -- GROUP BY sd.DictId,sd.DictName,sd.DictOrder -- ORDER BY sd.DictOrder FOR xml path ('')),1,1,'') AS NumList -- FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd2 -- WHERE sd2.TypeId = '61c44efb-ec19-4f92-9c47-507dee5b4bbe' ORDER BY DictOrder
